update.description:
This PR is an attempt to port the plugin features of `ign-common` into its own project with its own library name while roughly maintaining the version history.

This PR is probably unwieldy, but it's mostly just a restructuring and renaming of all the plugin code that's currently in `ign-common`'s default branch.
update.title: Part 2: port PluginPtrSemantics to new repository

content.raw: Thanks, that fixed it for me. I'm using `gcc (Ubuntu 8-20180414-1ubuntu2) 8.0.1 20180414 (experimental) [trunk revision 259383]`, which is what we're [using](https://bitbucket.org/ignitionrobotics/ign-math/src/994da159c7a4907fb869580c20ade3a9586b7699/bitbucket-pipelines.yml?at=gz11&fileviewer=file-view-default#bitbucket-pipelines.yml-8) on the `gz11` branches.
content.html: Thanks, that fixed it for me. I'm using gcc (Ubuntu 8-20180414-1ubuntu2) 8.0.1 20180414 (experimental) [trunk revision 259383], which is what we're using on the gz11 branches.

content.raw:
I tried compiling on my home computer which is running bionic. This warning didn’t seem to appear when compiling with either gcc \(7.3.0\) or clang \(6.0.0\), so I don’t know whether [532c6c6](#!/ignitionrobotics/ign-plugin/commits/532c6c6) will have actually fixed it or not.

Do you know if there’s anything special about your configuration that might have gotten the warning to print for you?
content.html:
I tried compiling on my home computer which is running bionic. This warning didn’t seem to appear when compiling with either gcc (7.3.0) or clang (6.0.0), so I don’t know whether 532c6c6 will have actually fixed it or not.

Do you know if there’s anything special about your configuration that might have gotten the warning to print for you?

/mnt/TERA/code/ign-plugin/core/include/ignition/plugin/detail/PluginMacros.hh:103:71: warning: type qualifiers ignored on cast result type [-Wignored-qualifiers]
         reinterpret_cast<ignition::plugin::Info * * const>(_outputInfo); \
                                                                       ^
/mnt/TERA/code/ign-plugin/core/include/ignition/plugin/PluginMacros.hh:110:3: note: in expansion of macro ‘DETAIL_IGN_PLUGIN_BEGIN_ADDING_PLUGINS’
   DETAIL_IGN_PLUGIN_BEGIN_ADDING_PLUGINS
   ^~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

 IGN_PLUGIN_BEGIN_ADDING_PLUGINS

~~~
